Uses of Package
net.nicholaswilliams.java.licensing.exception

  • Packages that use net.nicholaswilliams.java.licensing.exception 
    Package Description
    net.nicholaswilliams.java.licensing  
    net.nicholaswilliams.java.licensing.encryption  
    net.nicholaswilliams.java.licensing.exception  
    net.nicholaswilliams.java.licensing.licensor  
  • Classes in net.nicholaswilliams.java.licensing.exception used by net.nicholaswilliams.java.licensing 
    Class and Description
    AlgorithmNotSupportedException
    This exception is thrown when the specified algorithm is not supported by this JVM.
    CorruptSignatureException
    This is thrown when a corrupt signature ar non-signature is provided.
    FailedToDecryptException
    This exception is thrown when the data was corrupt and undecryptable or when the provided decryption password was incorrect.
    InappropriateKeyException
    This exception is thrown when the specified key is inappropriate for the given cipher.
    InappropriateKeySpecificationException
    This exception is thrown when an inappropriate key specification is provided for the key factory.
    InvalidLicenseException
    This exception is thrown whenever a license is validated that isn't valid for some reason.
    InvalidSignatureException
    This is thrown when a signature is invalid and cannot be verified.
    KeyNotFoundException
    This is thrown when the key (file) could not be found.
    ObjectDeserializationException
    This class is thrown when an error occurs while reading an object from a byte array.
    ObjectSerializationException
    This class is thrown when an I/O error occurs while writing an object to a byte array.
  • Classes in net.nicholaswilliams.java.licensing.exception used by net.nicholaswilliams.java.licensing.encryption 
    Class and Description
    AlgorithmNotSupportedException
    This exception is thrown when the specified algorithm is not supported by this JVM.
    InappropriateKeyException
    This exception is thrown when the specified key is inappropriate for the given cipher.
    InappropriateKeySpecificationException
    This exception is thrown when an inappropriate key specification is provided for the key factory.
    KeyNotFoundException
    This is thrown when the key (file) could not be found.
    RSA2048NotSupportedException
    This exception is thrown when 2048-bit RSA security, which is required for this library to run, is not supported with the current JVM.
  • Classes in net.nicholaswilliams.java.licensing.exception used by net.nicholaswilliams.java.licensing.exception 
    Class and Description
    InvalidLicenseException
    This exception is thrown whenever a license is validated that isn't valid for some reason.
